q1.question: How do you typically feel after an extended gaming session?
q1.option1: I feel energetic and happy after gaming
q1.option2: I feel slightly tired but okay
q1.option3: I feel very exhausted and drained
q1.option4: I feel sick and extremely tired

q2.question: How many hours do you typically spend gaming each day?
q2.option1: I play for 1-2 hours per day
q2.option2: I play for 2-4 hours per day
q2.option3: I play for 4-6 hours per day
q2.option4: I play for more than 6 hours per day

q3.question: What beverages do you consume while gaming?
q3.option1: I drink water only while gaming
q3.option2: I drink natural juices and water
q3.option3: I drink energy drinks and coffee
q3.option4: I don't drink anything while gaming

q4.question: Do you take regular breaks during your gaming sessions?
q4.option1: Yes, I move around and walk every hour
q4.option2: Yes, I take short breaks occasionally
q4.option3: I rarely take breaks during gaming
q4.option4: No, I play continuously until finished

q5.question: What type of food do you typically eat while gaming?
q5.option1: I eat healthy and balanced meals
q5.option2: I eat fruits and vegetables as snacks
q5.option3: I eat fast food and quick meals
q5.option4: I eat sweets and unhealthy snacks

q6.question: How do you typically handle losing in video games?
q6.option1: I learn from my mistakes calmly and patiently
q6.option2: I try again and practice to improve
q6.option4: I get angry and sometimes shout

q7.question: Do you prefer playing games with friends or alone?
q7.option1: I always play with my friends and teammates
q7.option2: I sometimes play with friends, sometimes alone
q7.option3: I rarely play with other people
q7.option4: I always play games by myself

q8.question: What activities do you engage in after finishing gaming?
q8.option1: I read books or learn something new
q8.option2: I listen to music or podcasts

results.title: Gaming Health Master!
results.description: You've taken excellent steps in maintaining your health while gaming. Keep up these good habits!
results.suggestedText: Continue to exercise regularly, maintain a healthy diet, and ensure you get adequate sleep. These habits will help you maintain your physical and mental well-being while enjoying your gaming experience.
results.excellent: Excellent! You are a role model for healthy gaming practices and lifestyle choices.
results.good: Good! You can improve some habits to achieve even better results and health outcomes.
results.fair: Fair, but there's significant room for improvement in your health habits and gaming routine.
results.needsImprovement: You need to make substantial improvements to your health habits while gaming.
